name: Pending Fund Members Details
query:
WITH pending_counts AS (
    SELECT
        fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
        COUNT(*) AS `Total Pending Count`
    FROM
        `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
    INNER JOIN
        `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
    WHERE
        (sfac_inst.are_you_received_1st_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.1st_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
        OR (sfac_inst.are_you_received_2nd_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.2nd_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
        OR (sfac_inst.are_you_received_3rd_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.3rd_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
        OR (sfac_inst.are_you_received_4th_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.4th_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
        OR (sfac_inst.are_you_received_5th_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.5th_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
        OR (sfac_inst.are_you_received_6th_installment_fund = 'No' AND sfac_inst.6th_installment_due_date < CURDATE())
    GROUP BY
        fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy
)

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'First Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_1st_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.1st_installment_due_date < CURDATE()

UNION ALL

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'Second Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_2nd_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.2nd_installment_due_date < CURDATE()

UNION ALL

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'Third Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_3rd_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.3rd_installment_due_date < CURDATE()

UNION ALL

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'Fourth Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_4th_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.4th_installment_due_date < CURDATE()

UNION ALL

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'Fifth Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_5th_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.5th_installment_due_date < CURDATE()

UNION ALL

SELECT
    fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy AS `FPO Name`,
    fpo_profiling.contact_detail_of_fpo AS `FPO Contact Number`,
    'Sixth Installment' AS Installment,
    pending_counts.`Total Pending Count`
FROM
    `tabSFAC Installment` AS sfac_inst
INNER JOIN
    `tabFPO Profiling` AS fpo_profiling ON sfac_inst.fpo = fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo
INNER JOIN
    pending_counts ON fpo_profiling.name_of_the_fpo_copy = pending_counts.`FPO Name`
WHERE
    sfac_inst.are_you_received_6th_installment_fund = 'No'
    AND sfac_inst.6th_installment_due_date < CURDATE();
